long_description: The ideal cord for anchoring and rescue; glow-in-the-dark tracer throughout the cord makes it easy to the identify a belay station in the dark. Durable Corde-Lite(TM) sheath material has a supple hand and holds knots well. With 10 minutes of exposure to light the white phosphorescent portion of the sheath glows for up to 10 hours. Weighs 198 grams.
short_description: The ideal cord for anchoring and rescue; glow-in-the-dark tracer throughout the cord makes it easy to the identify a belay station in the dark.
